'To mnimeio kai i eikona tou: Apokatastaseis stin Agia Sofia Thessalonikis'
'Synoptiki parousiasi tis methodologias meletis kai erevnas pou akolouthithike gia ti stereosi tis Rotondas Thessalonikis'
'Syntirisi esoterikou diakosmou mnimeion: Allilexartisi me ti stereosi tou ktiriou '
'Ta psifidota tis Thessalonikis kai o Yannis Kolefas

note: 21 N. Ioannidou, '0 rolos ton mnimeion mesa stin poli', Provlimata diasosis, 29-35.
title: 'I thesi ton mnimeion mesa sti synchroni Thessaloniki: Protaseis gia axiopoiisi'

In recent years the Church has made unauthorized interventions in such important monuments as the Rotunda and the church of St Demetrius, thus distorting their historical form and assailing their aesthetic integrity
